name: Crossover
description:
Crossover is my first game that I have finished and published. It's been a fun project to work on for the experience and I would love any feedback and suggestions. 

This is a puzzle/shooting game about creating your own path and collecting keys to make it out of the Abyss, while shooting creatures who are trying to keep you there.

All art, music, and everything was created by me. Let me know if you need any music or SFX.
